title: Incorrect YAML escaping in front matter generation
description: The _write_prompt_file function uses json.dumps() to escape the description field in YAML front matter. This is incorrect YAML syntax and will break with multi-line descriptions, special YAML characters (: [,] {!&*}), or certain Unicode characters.
acceptance_criteria: YAML front matter uses proper YAML escaping
Special YAML characters are properly escaped
Unit tests cover edge cases for description content
